In MATLAB, you can fetch the data simply by

```matlab
% replace <level> with 1, 2, or 3
data = urlread("https://storage.covid19datahub.io/rawdata-<level>.csv");

% save to tempfile
csv_file_name = tempname;
tmp_file = fopen(csv_file_name, 'w');
fwrite(tmp_file, data);
fclose(tmp_file);

% parse csv from file
data = readtable(csv_file_name);
```
